en.dialogueLevel0Line1: Hello Explorers! Let's discover the secrets of motion in the universe together. I'm Newti, and I'll be your guide.
en.dialogueLevel1Line1: Motion means when something moves from one place to another. Imagine this area as our playground, where we can learn about motion by exploring different structures.
en.dialogueLevel1Line2: Your goal is to understand motion by toppling all the wooden structures in our space playground.
en.dialogueLevel1Line3: Congratulations on a job well done! You have successfully fired multiple projectiles and toppled all the structures.
en.dialogueLevel2Line1: In this level, we will explore the connection between cosmic force and distance.
en.dialogueLevel2Line2: We discovered that objects require more force to travel longer distances and less force to travel shorter distances.
en.dialogueLevel2Line3: Adjust your strength and distance and see how it affects your throws against the wooden structures.
en.dialogueLevel2Line4: Congratulations! You have successfully destroyed all of the structures!
en.dialogueLevel3Line1: Let's explore why launching the giant stone requires more force on our cosmic voyage.
en.dialogueLevel3Line2: Stones are like stars in the universe, with varying mass. Larger stones need more force to move and start their journey through space.
en.dialogueLevel3Line3: When throwing a heavy rock, apply more force to compensate for its mass. Discover the principles of physics!
en.dialogueLevel3Line4: Congratulations! You have successfully destroyed all the structures!
en.dialogueLevel4Line1: Let us explore the concept of predicting the future of an object based on past movements.
en.dialogueLevel4Line2: Let's collect all the candies in this area!
en.dialogueLevel4Line3: Congratulations! By recognizing patterns in movements, you could anticipate where the rock would land on the next launch.
en.dialogueLevel5Line1: Let's explore the importance of force direction in our journey through the cosmos.
en.dialogueLevel5Line2: When we launch a projectile, the direction we apply force determines its trajectory and the place where it will land.
en.dialogueLevel5Line3: If we throw the candies only in one direction, some may be left behind. With a bit of practice, we can adjust our aim and collect all the candies.
en.dialogueLevel5Line4: Excellent work! Let's continue to explore and collect cosmic treats. Keep up the great effort!
en.dialogueLevel6Line1: Let's examine the idea that forces are simply pushes or pulls on objects.
en.dialogueLevel6Line2: Our strategy involves applying force to the stone to make it fall towards the candy.
en.dialogueLevel6Line3: Magnificent! The force of throwing the stone caused a beautiful collision that helped us reach our objective.
en.dialogueLevel7Line1: Greetings! In this particular level, we'll explore patterns of movement in space.
en.dialogueLevel7Line2: Let's take into account that while shooting a basketball, the target is in a constant motion.
en.dialogueLevel7Line3: Great job, explorers! The ability to identify patterns can lead to incredible accomplishments.
en.dialogueLevel8Line1: Hello, adventurers! In this level, we need to anticipate a vertical movement pattern.
en.dialogueLevel8Line2: Great job! Examining patterns from various perspectives can result in remarkable accomplishments.
en.dialogueLevel9Line1: Hello there! Today, we will delve into the topic of observing and measuring patterns of motion.
en.dialogueLevel9Line2: For a better shot, make sure to watch the full extent of the hoop animation.
en.dialogueLevel9Line3: Congratulations on demonstrating the observance and measurement of patterns of motion!
en.dialogueLevel10Line1: Greetings! Prepare for an exciting adventure where timing and precision are key. Be ready - the hoop moves faster in this challenging level.
en.dialogueLevel10Line2: Excellent! You have successfully conquered the moving target with great skill.
en.dialogueLevel10Line3: Our space mission has come to an end, but we are eagerly looking forward to more thrilling adventures in the future. See you soon!
en.tutorialLevelOne: Hello! Are you ready to play?
